posts.content:
Website for Brighton Breeze 2015 is here:-

http://www.brightonbreeze.co.uk/
Please note the early bird discount offer expires this Saturday, the 15th August, so get your tickets quick!
looking forward to this I will be marshalling again this year

Message from Susie via Facebook:-

Bookings close at midnight on Tuesday 15th September, 2 DAYS TIME!! The last batch of tickets will be posted soon after that. Today I have sorted out our merry band of marshals.

Bookings close tomorrow at midnight!

http://www.brightonbreeze.co.uk/

Online bookings for Brighton Breeze 2015 are now closed!!

Tickets are available on the gate for any remaining places at £46 per vehicle, (correct money please) including regalia pack & 1 t-shirt and free entry to the show and shine.

However, tickets on the gate are very limited as pre-bookings have been greater than ever so once all tickets are sold we will have to turn vehicles away.
General Parking is available in surrounding streets and pedestrian access to Madeira Drive is free of charge.

Camping at Hook Road is available to those that already have a run ticket but did not pre-book for the Friday night camping there.
Please pay £6 on the gate (correct money please).

Camping at Brighton racecourse for Saturday night is now SOLD OUT.

Any further queries, please view the Frequently Asked Questions here
http://www.brightonbreeze.co.uk/faqs.html

Thank you

Susie
